note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
name: Lazy-social-buttons
tagline: A JavaScript plugin to place social buttons on a page on user interaction (mouseover) to spare the initial page load from the 300kb+ download requests for social APIs.
body:
